data_table.description: Form 32 - Family History Questionnaire -- number of full-blooded sisters and brothers, daughters, and sons; parental age or date of death; relatives' history of' diabetes, myocardial infarction, stroke, cancers; fractures in parents (site, age). This self-administered questionnaire was required for all OS participants.

variable.name: SISTER
variable.description: Have a sister who reached adulthood
variable.comment: Have you ever had any full-blooded sisters who reached adulthood (age 21)?

variable.name: SISNUM
variable.comment: How many sisters? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q1 'Sisters who reached adulthood'.

variable.name: BROTHER
variable.description: Have a brother who reached adulthood
variable.comment: Have you ever had any full-blooded brothers who reached adulthood (age 21)?

variable.name: BRONUM
variable.comment: How many brothers? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q2 'Brothers who reached adulthood'.

variable.name: DAUGHTER
variable.description: Have a daughter who reached adulthood
variable.comment: Have you ever had any daughters who reached adulthood (age 21)?

variable.name: DAUNUM
variable.comment: Sub-question of F32 V3 Q3 'Daughters who reached adult'.

variable.name: SON
variable.description: Have a son who reached adulthood
variable.comment: Have you ever had any sons who reached adulthood (age 21)?

variable.name: SONNUM
variable.comment: How many sons? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q4 'Sons who reached adulthood'.

variable.name: MOMALIVE
variable.comment: Is your natural mother still alive?

variable.name: MOMDIEDA
variable.comment: How old was she when she died? (Please guess as closely as you can.) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q5 'Mother still alive'.

variable.name: MOMAGE
variable.comment: How old is she now? (Please guess as closely as you can.) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q5 'Mother still alive'.

variable.name: DADALIVE
variable.comment: Is your natural father still alive?

variable.name: DADDIEDA
variable.comment: How old was he when he died? (Please guess as closely as you can.) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q6 'Father still alive'.

variable.name: DADAGE
variable.comment: How old is he now? (Please guess as closely as you can.) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q6 'Father still alive'.

variable.name: DIABREL
variable.comment: Did your mother or father, or full-blooded sisters, full-blooded brothers, daughters, or sons ever have sugar diabetes or high blood sugar that first appeared as an adult?

variable.name: DIABRELN
variable.description: Number of relatives had adult diabetes
variable.comment: How many of these relatives had diabetes? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q7 'Relatives with diabetes'.

variable.name: MIREL
variable.comment: Did your mother or father or full-blooded sisters, full-blooded brothers, daughters, or sons ever have a heart attack or myocardial infarction?

variable.name: MIMOM
variable.comment:
Did this relative have a heart attack? Mother (If yes, how old was he or she when the heart attack first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q8 'Relatives had heart attack'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he/she had heart attack

variable.name: MIDAD
variable.comment:
Did this relative have a heart attack? Father (If yes, how old was he or she when the heart attack first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q8 'Relatives had heart attack'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he/she had heart attack

variable.name: MISIS1
variable.comment:
Did this relative have a heart attack? Sister (If yes, how old was he or she when the heart attack first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q8 'Relatives had heart attack'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he/she had heart attack

variable.name: MISIS2
variable.comment:
Did this relative have a heart attack? Sister (If yes, how old was he or she when the heart attack first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q8 'Relatives had heart attack'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he/she had heart attack

variable.name: MISIS3
variable.comment:
Did this relative have a heart attack? Sister (If yes, how old was he or she when the heart attack first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q8 'Relatives had heart attack'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he/she had heart attack

variable.name: MIBRO1
variable.comment:
Did this relative have a heart attack? Brother (If yes, how old was he or she when the heart attack first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q8 'Relatives had heart attack'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he/she had heart attack

variable.name: MIBRO2
variable.comment:
Did this relative have a heart attack? Brother (If yes, how old was he or she when the heart attack first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q8 'Relatives had heart attack'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he/she had heart attack

variable.name: MIBRO3
variable.comment:
Did this relative have a heart attack? Brother (If yes, how old was he or she when the heart attack first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q8 'Relatives had heart attack'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he/she had heart attack

variable.name: MIDAU1
variable.comment:
Did this relative have a heart attack? Daughter (If yes, how old was he or she when the heart attack first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q8 'Relatives had heart attack'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he/she had heart attack

variable.name: MIDAU2
variable.comment:
Did this relative have a heart attack? Daughter (If yes, how old was he or she when the heart attack first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q8 'Relatives had heart attack'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he/she had heart attack

variable.name: MISON1
variable.comment:
Did this relative have a heart attack? Son (If yes, how old was he or she when the heart attack first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q8 'Relatives had heart attack'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he/she had heart attack

variable.name: MISON2
variable.comment:
Did this relative have a heart attack? Son (If yes, how old was he or she when the heart attack first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q8 'Relatives had heart attack'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he/she had heart attack

variable.name: STRKREL
variable.comment: Did your mother, father, full-blooded sisters, full-blooded brothers, daughters, or sons ever have a stroke?

variable.name: STRKRELN
variable.description: Number of relatives who had a stroke
variable.comment: How many of these relatives had a stroke? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q9 'Relative had stroke'.

variable.name: CANCFREL
variable.comment: Did any of your female relatives ever have cancer? For female relatives, please answer about your mother, full-blooded sisters, daughters, and grandmothers. Do not include aunts, cousins, and nieces.

variable.name: BRCAFREL
variable.comment: Did your mother, full-blooded sisters, daughters, or grandmothers ever have breast cancer? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever'.

variable.name: BRCAMOM
variable.comment:
Did this relative have breast cancer? Mother (If yes, how old was she when her breast cancer first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q11 'Female relative breast cancer'.
variable.value: Don't know if she had cancer

variable.name: BRCASIS1
variable.comment:
Did this relative have breast cancer? Sister (If yes, how old was she when her breast cancer first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q11 'Female relative breast cancer'.
variable.value: Don't know if she had cancer

variable.name: BRCASIS2
variable.comment:
Did this relative have breast cancer? Sister (If yes, how old was she when her breast cancer first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q11 'Female relative breast cancer'.
variable.value: Don't know if she had cancer

variable.name: BRCASIS3
variable.comment:
Did this relative have breast cancer? Sister (If yes, how old was she when her breast cancer first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q11 'Female relative breast cancer'.
variable.value: Don't know if she had cancer

variable.name: BRCADAU1
variable.comment:
Did this relative have breast cancer? Daughter (If yes, how old was she when her breast cancer first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q11 'Female relative breast cancer'.
variable.value: Don't know if she had cancer

variable.name: BRCADAU2
variable.comment:
Did this relative have breast cancer? Daughter (If yes, how old was she when her breast cancer first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q11 'Female relative breast cancer'.
variable.value: Don't know if she had cancer

variable.name: BRCADAU3
variable.comment:
Did this relative have breast cancer? Daughter (If yes, how old was she when her breast cancer first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q11 'Female relative breast cancer'.
variable.value: Don't know if she had cancer

variable.name: BRCAGMAM
variable.description: Age mat. grandmother had breast cancer
variable.comment:
Did this relative have breast cancer? Maternal grandmother (your mother's mother) (If yes, how old was she when her breast cancer first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q11 'Female relative breast cancer'.
variable.value: Don't know if she had cancer

variable.name: BRCAGMAP
variable.description: Age pat. grandmother had breast cancer
variable.comment:
Did this relative have breast cancer? Paternal grandmother (your father's mother) (If yes, how old was she when her breast cancer first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q11 'Female relative breast cancer'.
variable.value: Don't know if she had cancer

variable.name: COLOFREL
variable.comment: Did you mother, full-blooded sisters, or daughters ever have cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever'.

variable.name: COLOMOM
variable.comment:
Did this relative have cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel? Mother (If yes, how old was she when her cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q12 'Female relatives colorectal cancer'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if she had cancer

variable.name: COLOSIS1
variable.comment:
Did this relative have cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel? Sister (If yes, how old was she when her cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q12 'Female relatives colorectal cancer'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if she had cancer

variable.name: COLOSIS2
variable.comment:
Did this relative have cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel? Sister (If yes, how old was she when her cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q12 'Female relatives colorectal cancer'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if she had cancer

variable.name: COLOSIS3
variable.comment:
Did this relative have cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel? Sister (If yes, how old was she when her cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q12 'Female relatives colorectal cancer'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if she had cancer

variable.name: COLODAU1
variable.comment:
Did this relative have cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel? Daughter (If yes, how old was she when her cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q12 'Female relatives colorectal cancer'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if she had cancer

variable.name: COLODAU2
variable.comment:
Did this relative have cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel? Daughter (If yes, how old was she when her cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q12 'Female relatives colorectal cancer'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if she had cancer

variable.name: CERVREL
variable.comment: Did your mother, full-blooded sisters, or daughters ever have cancer of the cervix (opening to the womb)? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever'.

variable.name: CERVRELN
variable.description: Number of relatives had cervical cancer
variable.comment:
How many of these relatives had cancer of the cervix? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q13 'Female relatives cervical'.

variable.name: ENDOREL
variable.comment: Did your mother, full-blooded sisters, or daughters ever have cancer of the uterus, womb, or endometrium (lining of the womb)? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever'.

variable.name: ENDORELN
variable.description: Number of relatives had endomet. cancer
variable.comment:
How many of these relatives had cancer of the uterus, womb, or endometrium? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q14 'Female relatives endometrial'.

variable.name: OVARREL
variable.comment: Did your mother, full-blooded sisters, or daughters ever have cancer of the ovaries? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever'.

variable.name: OVARRELN
variable.description: Number of relatives had ovarian cancer
variable.comment:
How many of these relatives had cancer of the ovaries? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q10 'Female relative cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q15 'Female relatives ovarian'.

variable.name: CANCMREL
variable.description: Immediate male blood relative had cancer
variable.comment: Did any of your male relatives ever have cancer? (For male relatives, please answer about your father, full-blooded brothers, and sons. Do not include uncles, cousins, and nephews.)

variable.name: COLOMREL
variable.comment: Did your father, full-blooded brothers, or sons ever have cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q16 'Male relatives cancer ever'.

variable.name: COLODAD
variable.comment:
Did this relative have cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel? Father (If yes, how old was he when his cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q16 'Male relatives cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q17 'Male relatives colorectal cancer'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he had cancer

variable.name: COLOBRO1
variable.comment:
Did this relative have cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel? Brother (If yes, how old was he when his cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q16 'Male relatives cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q17 'Male relatives colorectal cancer'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he had cancer

variable.name: COLOBRO2
variable.comment:
Did this relative have cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel? Brother (If yes, how old was he when his cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q16 'Male relatives cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q17 'Male relatives colorectal cancer'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he had cancer

variable.name: COLOBRO3
variable.comment:
Did this relative have cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel? Brother (If yes, how old was he when his cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q16 'Male relatives cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q17 'Male relatives colorectal cancer'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he had cancer

variable.name: COLOSON1
variable.comment:
Did this relative have cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel? Son (If yes, how old was he when his cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q16 'Male relatives cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q17 'Male relatives colorectal cancer'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he had cancer

variable.name: COLOSON2
variable.comment:
Did this relative have cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel? Son (If yes, how old was he when his cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine, or bowel first occurred?) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q16 'Male relatives cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q17 'Male relatives colorectal cancer'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if he had cancer

variable.name: PROSREL
variable.comment: Did your father, full-blooded brothers, or sons ever have cancer of the prostate (male gland)? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q16 'Male relatives cancer ever'.

variable.name: PROSRELN
variable.description: Number of relatives had prostrate cancer
variable.comment:
How many of these relatives had cancer of the prostate? Sub-question of F32 V3 Q16 'Male relatives cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F32 V3 Q18 'Male relatives prostate'.

variable.name: BKBONMOM
variable.description: Mother broke a bone after age 40
variable.comment: Did your mother ever break or fracture a bone after she was 40 years old?

variable.name: BKHIPMOM
variable.comment:
Did your mother break this bone? Hip (If yes, how old was she when the bone was first broken.) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q19 'Fracture after 40 - mother'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if she broke bone

variable.name: BKBCKMOM
variable.description: Age mother broke spine or back
variable.comment:
Did your mother break this bone? Spine or back (Vertebra) (If yes, how old was she when the bone was first broken.) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q19 'Fracture after 40 - mother'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if she broke bone

variable.name: BKUARMOM
variable.comment:
Did your mother break this bone? Upper arm (humerus) (If yes, how old was she when the bone was first broken.) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q19 'Fracture after 40 - mother'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if she broke bone

variable.name: BKLARMOM
variable.comment:
Did your mother break this bone? Lower arm or wrist (If yes, how old was she when the bone was first broken.) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q19 'Fracture after 40 - mother'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if she broke bone

variable.name: BKOTHMOM
variable.description: Age mother broke other than listed bone
variable.comment:
Did your mother break this bone? Other (Specify) (If yes, how old was she when the bone was first broken.) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q19 'Fracture after 40 - mother'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if she broke bone

variable.name: BKBONDAD
variable.description: Father broke a bone after age 40
variable.comment: Did your father ever break or fracture a bone after he was 40 years old?

variable.name: BKHIPDAD
variable.comment:
Did your father break this bone? Hip (If yes, how old was he when the bone was first broken.) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q20 'Fracture after 40 - father'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if no broke bone

variable.name: BKBCKDAD
variable.description: Age father broke spine or back
variable.comment:
Did your father break this bone? Spine or back (Vertebra) (If yes, how old was he when the bone was first broken.) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q20 'Fracture after 40 - father'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if no broke bone

variable.name: BKUARDAD
variable.comment:
Did your father break this bone? Upper arm (humerus) (If yes, how old was he when the bone was first broken.) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q20 'Fracture after 40 - father'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if no broke bone

variable.name: BKLARDAD
variable.comment:
Did your father break this bone? Lower arm or wrist (If yes, how old was he when the bone was first broken.) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q20 'Fracture after 40 - father'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if no broke bone

variable.name: BKOTHDAD
variable.description: Age father broke other than listed bone
variable.comment:
Did your father break this bone? Other (Specify) (If yes, how old was he when the bone was first broken.) Sub-question of F32 V3 Q20 'Fracture after 40 - father'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 32.
variable.value: Don't know if no broke bone

variable.name: BKBONREL
variable.description: Mom or dad broke bone after age 40
variable.comment: Computed from Form 32, questions 19 and 20. Indicator for whether the participant's mother or father ever broke or fractured a bone after 40 years of age.

variable.name: COLOREL
variable.comment: Computed from Form 32, questions 10, 12, 16, and 17. Indicator variable of whether any of a participant's first degree relatives have had cancer of the colon, rectum, intestine or bowel.
